Shipping Restrictions & Information

We currently ship to addresses within the continental United States. International shipping may be available for select items - please contact us for details.

Shipping Cut-off Times:

  • Orders placed before 2 PM EST ship the same business day
  • Orders placed after 2 PM EST ship the next business day
  • Weekend orders ship on Monday

Holiday Shipping:

  • Holiday shipping deadlines are clearly marked during checkout
  • Express shipping may not be available during peak holiday seasons
  • Additional surcharges may apply for holiday rush delivery

Order Processing Times

Most orders are processed within 1-2 business days after payment is confirmed. Processing time includes:

  • Order verification and payment processing
  • Inventory checking and quality control
  • Packaging and final preparation

You will receive an email confirmation with tracking information once your order ships.

Track Your Order

Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. Use our tracking system to monitor your package's journey.

Track My Order →

Additional Shipping Information

Signature Requirements: Packages over $500 require adult signature upon delivery.

Address Changes: Contact us immediately if you need to change your shipping address.

Delivery Attempts: Carriers make up to 3 delivery attempts before returning to sender.

PO Boxes: We can ship to PO Boxes for most items, but some oversized items require physical addresses.
